title.narrative: Enhancing the capacity of NSA to improve the well-being of disadvantaged groups in Thanh Hoa Province

description.narrative: To reduce poverty and improve the health of disadvantaged people by strengthening the capacity of civil society organisations to promote more “grassroots-oriented” development in Vietnam

participating-org.narrative: Thanh Hoa Association of the Elderly, Vietnam
